```{r}
# Code to install necessary packages. Uncomment to install.
## try http:// if https:// URLs are not supported
# source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
#biocLite("ggtree")
#install.packages("ape")
#install.packages("plotly")

library(ape)
library(ggtree)
library(plotly)
library(treeio)


# CREATE A TREE -------------------------------------------------------------
n_samples <- 20
n_grp <- 4
tree <- ape::rtree(n = n_samples)

# CREATE SOME METADATA ----------------------------------------------------
id <- tree$tip.label
set.seed(42)
grp <- sample(LETTERS[1:n_grp], size = n_samples, replace = T)
dat <- tibble::tibble(id = id,
                      grp = grp)

# PLOT THE TREE -----------------------------------------------------------
p1 <- ggtree(tree)

metat <- p1$data %>%
  dplyr::inner_join(dat, c('label' = 'id'))

p2 <- p1 +
  geom_point(data = metat,
             aes(x = x,
                 y = y,
                 colour = grp,
                 label = id))

plotly::ggplotly(p2)
```
